verses.roman:
āpane khāibe kṛṣṇa, tāhāra lāgiyā
tomāra haste pāka karāya uttama kariyā

synonyms: āpane—personally; khāibe—will eat; kṛṣṇa—Lord Kṛṣṇa; tāhāra lāgiyā—for that reason; tomāra haste—by your hands; pāka karāya—causes to cook; uttama kariyā—so nicely.
translation: "Because He will personally eat the food, Kṛṣṇa makes you cook so nicely.
